name: OneHopeChurch
0:
”Alexa, open One Hope Church”
”Alexa, ask One Hope Church for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start One Hope Church”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: one hope church
des: Listen to the latest sermon from One Hope Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Your requests to this skill are not shared with One Hope Church.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
